page.title: 09Women(Survey)
page.content: {Equality at school and work:}Of the people we questioned 50% said that men and women had equal job opportunities; 50% felt that women were discriminated against. A small proportion felt that girls at school were geared towards studying "female subjects" eg. cookery as this would help them in their future "female" occupations. {Is the woman's place in the home?}The majority of people said that the woman's place was not at home; however a small number thought that if there were young children concerned a woman should be at home to look after them.
